loginError: Login failed. Please check your credentials.
sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please login again.
unauthorized: You are not authorized to access this resource.
signInMessage: Sign in to access your object storage
invalidCredentialsMessage: Username or password is incorrect. Please try again.
ssoUseButton: This account uses SSO. Please use the SSO login button below.
enterEmailToSignIn: Enter your email to sign in with
oauthError_missing_email: Your SSO provider did not return an email address. Please contact your administrator.
oauthError_email_conflict: This email is already associated with a local account. Please contact your administrator.
oauthError_provisioning_failed: Failed to create your account automatically. Please contact your administrator.
oauthError_user_not_registered: Your account is not registered. Please contact your administrator.
oauthError_no_group_mappings: SSO access has not been configured for this provider yet. Please contact your administrator.
oauthError_not_in_authorized_group: You are not authorized to access this system. Your account is not in any authorized group.
oauthError_oauth_denied: SSO login was cancelled or denied.
oauthError_exchange_failed: SSO authentication failed. Please try again.
oauthError_provider_unavailable: The SSO provider is currently unavailable. Please try again later.
oauthError_account_inactive: Your account is inactive. Please contact your administrator.
oauthError_account_locked: Your account is locked due to multiple failed attempts.
oauthError_csrf_failed: Security validation failed. Please try again.
oauthError_invalid_callback: Invalid SSO callback. Please try again.
oauthError_invalid_state: Invalid SSO state. Please try again.
oauthError_token_failed: Failed to generate session. Please try again.
